doc.title: Gymnastic Exercises in the British Army
doc.plot: "Some remarkable exhibitions are given by the skilled athletes of the British army, at the annual encampment at Aldershot. None are more remarkable, however, than the gymnastic exercises shown in this picture. A battalion of soldiers in athletic costume are running at wooden horses over which they vault head foremost in rapid succession, each man retreating to the rear as soon as he has made his vault."
